agentCard.name: Agent Card Generator Agent
agentCard.description:
Converts PlugPipe plug.yaml manifests to A2A Protocol agent-card.json format.
Enables PlugPipe plugins to be discoverable and invocable via Agent2Agent Protocol.

Key Features:
- Automatic conversion of plug.yaml to agent-card.json
- A2A specification compliance validation
- Batch processing for multiple plugins
- Sigstore signature support (optional)
- Skill mapping from PlugPipe capabilities

skills.name: Agent Card Generator
skills.description: Converts PlugPipe plug.yaml manifests to A2A Protocol agent-card.json format.

skills.name: Convert single plugin to agent card
skills.description: Convert single plugin to agent card

skills.name: Batch convert all plugins with validation
skills.description: Batch convert all plugins with validation

skills.name: Generate signed agent card with custom service URL
skills.description: Generate signed agent card with custom service URL
